remarks: The determinant of the zero matrix (of dimension greater 0!) is 0. (Contributed by AV, 17-Aug-2019.)
statement:
mdet0.d $e |- D = ( N maDet R ) $.
mdet0.a $e |- A = ( N Mat R ) $.
mdet0.b $e |- B = ( Base ` A ) $.
mdet0.z $e |- Z = ( 0g ` A ) $.
mdet0.0 $e |- .0. = ( 0g ` R ) $.
mdet0 $p |- ( ( R e. CRing /\ N e. Fin /\ N =/= (/) ) -> ( D ` Z ) = .0. ) $.
